name: Knight's Quest (Uniostar)
description:
Our hero's universe is colliding with other universes, can you help him keep the villainous forces out of the colliding worlds? 

WARNING : This game was created for windows and has no touch controls.

Press the button at the bottom (blue) of the screen to maximize the game to full view.

Controls - 

  • Attack - X
  • Jump - Space
  • Move - WASD/Arrow Keys

Music and Art were created by Luiz Menlo.

Software's Used - 

  • Unity 2d
  • Visual Studio 2019.1
  • Libresprite
